alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lawrence, west central Pennington, northeastern Weston and southeastern Crook Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 446 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buckhorn, or 19 miles north of Newcastle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buckhorn around 450 PM MDT. O`Neil Pass around 500 PM MDT. Cement Ridge Lookout around 515 PM MDT. Cheyenne Crossing, Roughlock Falls, Savoy and Iron Creek Lake around 520 PM MDT. Terry Peak around 525 PM MDT. Bridal Veil Falls around 530 PM MDT. Lead, Deadwood, Central City, Spearfish Canyon and Crow Peak around 535 PM MDT. Spearfish around 540 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 5 and 8, and between Mile Markers 12 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
